title: Secondary School Programming Fundamentals Education Through Game Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and gaming experience
context.additional_context: A foundational course for aspiring professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to develop computational thinking through game development, aiming to acquire programming concepts and enhance problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: Learners can implement simple game scenarios using block-based programming tools.
Learners can apply basic control structures such as loops and conditionals to game development.
Learners can collaboratively develop game project proposals and prototypes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
